website_summaries.verdict: Chock-full of good-for-you grains, including buckwheat, millet, oats, amaranth, and quinoa.
pros: This dark chocolate chunk bar offers a delicious and filling whole-grain snack
Gluten-free, non-GMO, no trans fat, kosher
Dark chocolate is more sweet than bitter

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I love these bars but have the same issue as another reviewer- Black spots!!! They aren’t mold and scratch off... but are unsettling. I’m gross and ate it anyway so I’ll let you all know if I die.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Random draw with these Kind Bars
customer_reviews.text: Update (5/22/19): Honestly, I would refrain from buy these online at Amazon. Every Kind bar I've purchased in an actual store are chewy; rather, I'm almost through my Amazon purchased Kind bar and ALL BUT TWO were extremely dry and crunchy. Definitely not ordering again on Amazon. The Dark Chocolate Chunk Kind Bars are excellent when they are soft and not tough as rocks. Unfortunately, it seems like the luck of the draw when purchasing these bars. My current batch are hard and too crunchy, not my preference but I'll still eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Knuckles89

customer_reviews.title: Stale and Stick to Teeth
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 6 boxes of 5, and the first bar I tried was stale. The bar was also overly sweet and seemed to stick to the teeth. Maybe if they had a little less sugar, that would not happen. I'll try one from another box, and if I have the same issues, they are going into the trash. I did however enjoy the other two varieties I got with this order, which are the Kind Plus Dark Choc Cherry Cashew, and the Kind PB and Dark Choc, 8 gm Protein.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty but messy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these by mistake. I thought I was buying the peanut dark chocolate protein bar. But these are very very tasty. I cannot eat just one. But the flaw is in the shape of them. They are wide enough that you cannot take a vertical bite. You have to sort of bite at a 45 degree angle. But because they are very crumbly, pieces inevitably fall off. So they are very messy which is why I took a star off. At the office there is a pile of crumbs on the floor by by chair after I eat them. At home I have to eat them standing over the kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Z

customer_reviews.title: One box was opened and one missing bar...
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed. One of the 6 box are opened and someone are one of the bar. It's only 4 bars in that box. I will keep other 5 boxes which are not opened, but this opened box and 4 bars are going to garbage.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: They taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these bars....the dark chocolate, the multigrain and gluten free. I keep them on hand for when my sweet tooth acts up. I would definitely recommend them to anyone who likes a handy snack with relatively low calories and sugar. Also no artificial sweeteners or even stevia which I do not like the taste of. Will continue buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Word Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Quick go to when you don't have time to eat
customer_reviews.text: I kept boxes of these in my desk at work, in my truck, and at home. Buying them in bulk is less expensive than one offs and always having them on hand when I don't have time to stop for food has been great. The dark chocolate chunk is my favorite KIND bar and my grandkids think they're candy bars so there's a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Marie Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Expires in one month?!
customer_reviews.text: All of the bars expire in one month... Let that sink in. You buy 40 bars and even if you ate one per day, then 10 bars would still expire before you could eat them. What, is this supposed to be the Super Size Me for Kind bar challenge? Absolutely disgraceful they are shipping out product with such short expiration dates. Definitely returning this and not re-ordering. Amazon, I expect a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander L. Pina

customer_reviews.title: I did not receive the bars in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the bars in the picture-just so you know you’ll get the one pictured above-totally different bars.
customer_reviews.author: SusanA

customer_reviews.title: Similar to the Cardboard Granola Bars
customer_reviews.text: These tasted stale and and the consistency was cardboard like. My advice to prospective buyers, get one at a local store and see if you like it first. I bought six boxes because it was a great deal and am not unable to return any because of Amazon Policy.
customer_reviews.author: starpenguin

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: I received these in late December 2019, but all the boxes expired in November 2019. I normally love these, so I excitedly opened one up to eat as soon as I got them. To my great dismay, it tasted stale! It wasn’t even the least bit chewy anymore! Sure enough, I checked the boxes to find they all have a “best by” date of one month ago.
customer_reviews.author: hhatcher

customer_reviews.title: manufactured in January 2017
customer_reviews.text: I purchased dark chocolate 30 bars for ~12$. part of the reason i buy is their long shelf life in room temperature. when it delivered today, I had a Donald Duck's Ah-o to find the manufacture date was as once-upon as January 2017. with only 6 months left to expire, i doubt if I'll be able to finish them in time. it might be the reason why it's so cheap. it does make my choice disappointment. Have I just had my ignorant lesson that low price = expiring stuff? if the seller Amazon specified clearly the manufacture date, I wouldn't have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zhuo

customer_reviews.title: A very standard granola bar
customer_reviews.text: When I imagine KIND, I think of the fruit and nut delight bar. A delightful combination of dry fruits and whole nuts that felt substantial and real in a world filled with mystery grain sugary granola bars. Inspired by this reputation I took a shot at buying these KIND Healthy Grain bars for my COVID stockpile. I was disappointed to find out that these were nothing more than standard granola bars. Paragraph length ingredient lists, boring brown color and sugary flavor. As emergency food and occasional snack this works perfectly find but you do get what you pay for. This is not a mini luxury that brightens your day. Adequate. Nothing more, nothing less.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Karamazov

customer_reviews.title: Can't taste the coconut!!
customer_reviews.text: Really regret buying these for several reasons: 1. Can't taste coconut flavor 2. They have 23 carbs for a small square. The KIND almond and coconut bars have 21 carbs and great coconut flavor! 3. There are a lot of some kind of flavorless round grain (reminds me of birdseed, lol) that I really dislike!
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: S T A L E
customer_reviews.text: Bought these same bars from the store and they were delicious, the ones that amazon sent me were very hard and stale, asked for an exchange but the new ones were just as hard and stale.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: I love these Kind bars. Great money savings!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are a great desk snack when I am at work and I don’t have time to grab breakfast or when I’m in the mood for a midday sweet fix. Healthier than getting anything from the vending machine and who can be mad at dark chocolate and peanuts. My only complaint would be that they can be crumbly but I love them none the less. Plus these are almost six dollars each in the store so I was excited to see Amazon had them in a six pack at this price with prime shipping. So I will buy them again. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna L

customer_reviews.title: 20% were stale due to faulty packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 boxes, each of the 3 boxes had stale bars due to the packaging being incorrectly sealed on the individual bar. About 20% total between the boxes were stale and hard as a rock. They also have a really surprisingly high amount of added sugar per bar. Flavor is pretty good though, due I'm sure to the large amount of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check Expiration Date
customer_reviews.text: Check your expiration date first before opening! Expiration Date is Jan 2019 for these particular bars. Product tastes “off”. All other bars (same brand) purchased have exp. date of Aug 2019 and are fine. Unfortunately, I purchased the most of these. I agree this is my fault as I didn’t check first, however I would have never purchased them from the grocery store with this date. Maybe it’s just me, but I get the furthest date out for our bread too.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Ladish

customer_reviews.title: Short Shipped
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item several times (my wife likes them). Usually the shipment is in a Kind shipping carton that was sealed at the factory. This time, the box was taped over so I could tell it had been opened sometime after Kind shipped it to Amazon. When I opened it, there were only 4 boxes (5 bars) each instead of 6. I could seal the box back up and return it, but in these times, that isn't really essential travel. So with one third of the product missing, I was apparently ripped off for 30% of the selling price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Oppel

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal I’ve purchased several cases. What I will say is I suspect these were not kept in a temperature controlled environment. Compared to the exact same bars/flavors as the grocery store these are all tougher to chew (not as fresh, is the best I can describe this) Also many of the bars (2 per pack) are stuck together, again leads me to believe they were frozen thawed over heated in a warehouse or on shipping trucks. No issue with any of the expiration dates are all reasonable. Have and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been eating Kind Protein bars myself and figured this Kind Healty bars would be good for my kids. They love them; however, I must say these bars make a big mess. They crumble easily so there are dropping everywhere, and should you carry them in you backpack during a bike ride during a hot day, the chocolate chips melt and the bar crumbles even before the pack is opened. Word of advice, bring lots of tissue paper with you.
customer_reviews.author: Son L.

customer_reviews.title: FYI not chewy
customer_reviews.text: They were supposed to be the chewy with a crunch kind but they are the hard kind
customer_reviews.author: VICTORIA N.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Kind Bars
customer_reviews.text: Naturally taste is subjective, but these are absolutely my favorite Kind granola bars. There's a touch of vanilla sweetness to them and the dried blueberries add a nice pop of flavor. If you've never had Kind's variant on granola bars, note that they are a little different. They're not hard and brittle but they're also not the soft granola bars like Quaker Chewy (which always felt a little artificial to me - in the same way that soft bake cookies do.)
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Also order with a dustpan....
customer_reviews.text: So, I love me a granola bar....HOWEVER, by the time I have eaten it, about 75% of it has disintegrated onto the floor and surrounding areas. I no more than glance at the package and it has crumbled into an unrecognized bar of food. I mean it’s tasty, don’t get me wrong, but you’ll only get to enjoy and 25% of it. Food for thought.
customer_reviews.author: Linds H

customer_reviews.title: Try them with peanut butter on top!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my house loves these. Plain or with peanut butter spread on top is a perfect snack or small breakfast. I have more coming the end of the month! The only downside is they do fall apart very easily so I would give them to a child in the car or something.. I think that's because they are mostly whole ingredients and not a lot of sticking ingredients which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Tasty granola bars
customer_reviews.text: I love “kind” granola bars, and the maple pumpkin seed is my favorite flavor. I’m never able to find them in grocery stores any more, so now I order them. They arrive quickly, and are so far always fresh. I purchase them often.
customer_reviews.author: HisKid

customer_reviews.title: Be aware item may be close to expiration
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is okay. I love cinnamon but was not impressed by these bars. I ordered the pack of 40 and when I received them I was annoyed to find that they were about to expire in 2 weeks! Honestly kept them because at the time during the pandemic going on I didn't want to be petty and make a return given how busy Amazon seemed to be. FYI I could usually care less about expiration on things that have a longer shelf life but these definitely had an "off" taste to them and they were borderline stale.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: For the Birds
customer_reviews.text: It looks nothing like the photo. Double dark chocolate? I don’t see any chocolate. It’s more reminiscent of one of those sticky bird seed discs. And guess what—tastes like what I imagine a lump of bird seed would taste like, too. This is one of those things you should buy on a smaller scale first to see if you like it before buying a bulk package.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: The Allergy Information has changed!
customer_reviews.text: This product used to be peanut-free and tree nut-free. The last time I ordered it it was safe to eat. Now they have changed their label and the product MAY contain peanuts and tree nuts. This is unacceptable. No one with an allergy would risk their life on a food that may contain dangerous ingredients. The label on Amazon is WRONG. See my photo as of Sept. 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeves

customer_reviews.title: Diabetes nutritionist approved and it Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Diagnosed as a Type 2 diabetic on 12/24/18...Lots of lifestyle changes for sure. Surprised to learn that these bars are low carb friendly and as such can be enjoyed. Certainly helps wish the transition to healthier living. The Amazon price is so cost effective. Loved feeling I wasn’t being deprived of one of life’s few remaining pleasures.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Started great...now not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Starting with the third shipment of these we noticed that quite a few were not sealed and were rock hard. But with this last shipment came one that was just too much for us. Quality control standards may need to be upped a bit, I'd say.
customer_reviews.author: brian b.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, they’re stale and gross
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and decided to take a risk. I should have listened to the reviews. The product came in stale and hard instead of soft with a little chew to it. If you buy it in stores, you get a better experience with it. It’s worth the extra money to get it the way it should be. I will not be buying this from Amazon again. Learn from my mistake, don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date is only 3 months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of Kind bars, but buyer beware! I received a 5-box shipment the end of May 2020 and the expiration date is August 2020. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Susan9794

customer_reviews.title: Skip these Products!
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT even close to the flavor or quality of Kind bars. These are a cheap mixture of sugary granola and sticky syrup. Over priced and over hyped they are a manor step down from the Kind Bars which have real ingredients. Unfortunately I bought these of Subscribe and Save, so now I have 6 boxes to trash.
customer_reviews.author: BAC Houston, TX

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and not too sweet.
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to find something that isn't full of chocolate or sugar. Granola bars have become sweeter and more fattening than candy bars. This one was perfect and I had them for traveling when we needed them to fill in for a late or missed meal time. Or when my stomach was adjusting to the time change. Flavor was pleasant and I like that they are thinner for packing in a purse or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Neither very chewy nor very crunchy.
customer_reviews.text: Decent flavor and nutritional content. Bought a whole box for the kid because she generally likes this genre of bar but they were not a hit with her. I wasn’t a huge fan of the texture. It’s like it can’t decide between being chewy and sweet or crunch and salty. These two things combined should make a great bar, but for me these just don’t pull the combination off very well.
customer_reviews.author: LXXV

customer_reviews.title: Freshness Varies By Box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered multiple boxes of these kind bars. 60% of the boxes, the bars were hard and semi-stale, but the flavor was decent enough. Not worth the hassle of returning. The remaining boxes, were fresh. The bars were very good and tasted excellent. The peanut butter chocolate is very good, as long as the bars are fresh. As I can tell, there's no way of checking their freshness before ordering. Would buy again, but at local store, where I can check the expiration date, and more easily return them if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Haveaniceday

customer_reviews.title: Simple, pure granola goodness!
customer_reviews.text: Oats & Honey with Toasted Coconut Healthy Grains Bars have great, chewy texture with a touch of honey sweetness and a very subtle toasted coconut flavor. I would enjoy more of the toasted coconut but these bars are still very satisfying for breakfast or a snack, especially if you want something pure and simple!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Fogliatti

customer_reviews.title: Lower sugar, satisfying chew
customer_reviews.text: Great chewy alternative to other snacks with high sugar content. I first selected this from a vending machine as the only “not candy” choice. Liked it so much I decided to bypass the vending machine and buy directly. Easy to throw into my book bag for a late afternoon nosh.
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: Old and stale!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Generally love these bars so decided to buy from amazon. 8 boxes of 5. Opened and first bite, very stale. Tried another, also stale. Took a look at the expiration dates, all boxes expire in 3 months!! Will not be purchasing these here again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Camacho

customer_reviews.title: OPEN PRODUCT IN THE BOX
customer_reviews.text: There are 6 boxes in a case of these KIND Vanilla Blueberry healthy grain bars. 2 of the boxes contained bars that weren't sealed. Somehow they made it through whatever quality check they have at the factory. I checked the other 4 boxes and all are sealed. It disapointing and I can't take it back like I could if I bought it at Wal Mart or the supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: Sassys Mom

customer_reviews.title: Be careful..some are old but the exp date shows still 'fresh'..
customer_reviews.text: Hard as a brick. the expiration date was like 6 months away, yet they taste old and are hard??? Cancelling my S&S.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: People with food allergies beware
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought these specific kind bars because the package labelling shown on Amazon states they are made in a facility that uses nuts. When they arrived, the labelling is different and says may contain nuts. While a subtle difference to most, my food allergy kid can't eat the ones that were shipped and I would not have ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Lidpie

customer_reviews.title: Tasty & I HATE dark chocolate
customer_reviews.text: This is the best value I have found for these bars. I’m allergic to gluten and coconut, so these are one fo the few bars of theirs I can eat, and I LOVE them, and I literally HATE dark chocolate, but it isn’t overpowering, so don’t dislike these bars. They taste so good!
customer_reviews.author: Reese G

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, no issues
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! I tried a similar granola bar from this brand at an outdoor event and they were amazing so I had to try these too. So good! I'll probably get some that aren't chocolate too for hiking (totally getting these again for winter hiking though).
customer_reviews.author: Pigglies

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite KIND Bars
customer_reviews.text: These are great tasting bars that I use for breakfast most mornings. Being able to order them via Amazon in multi-box packs has been a good choice for me. The nutrition label numbers are not bad for some protein to start the day.
customer_reviews.author: eusrIMHO

customer_reviews.title: Outdated or almost outdated item
customer_reviews.text: This was my second order within a month. the first order was a whole year out of date and uneatable. This second order is due to expire within one month and the bars are all dried out. I returned the first order but reluctantly kept this one as it was not totally outdated. This has been a great product in the past and I have ordered many times but will not buy it from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: We love these bars!
customer_reviews.text: I gave them a try on a whim and we love them so much! They are a great snack to pack for a day of hiking, mid day school snack or sitting around the tv. I will definitely be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These cannot seem to be found anywhere but here. I am SO happy, these are my jam! Best BeKind bars ever!
customer_reviews.author: Janel A.

customer_reviews.title: I received the wrong product.
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong product. I got the original Kind bars that mostly contain nuts instead of the granola bars. See attached images. I was unable to return or exchange the product, and now have a box full of bars I don't want.
customer_reviews.author: Noopur

customer_reviews.title: Deliciousness!
customer_reviews.text: I am hands down addicted to these bars. I will never stop buying them and eating them daily. They have amazing flavor and help with my tummy issues that I have. If I had 5 thumbs, I’d give these 5 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Calista

customer_reviews.title: A Delectable Piece Of Yum!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m finding these a delicious little bite. I’m allergic to nuts so I’m pleased to have all the taste and texture without the problems. The chocolate doesn’t bother me either. They’re great in yogurt, but I love them just cold out of the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Sashmom

customer_reviews.title: Superb value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! These are much lower in price than buying individual boxes from big box stores and grocery markets. Perfect for a filling afternoon snack or breakfast on the go. This is my favorite Kind bar flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My Kind of product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Almond Butter and Dark Chocolate bars but they are hard to find sometimes. I do not live near a city. Amazon is very convenient. Package arrive on time and neatly shipped. It was a good amount for the money. Will be ordering again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is okay
customer_reviews.text: Love the blueberries version of this. Wanted to give this flavor a try, did not like this compared with the blueberry version. It is a little too dark chocolate for me. Now gotta wait until the blueberry flavored ones go on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Relatively Healthy
customer_reviews.text: This review is for "KIND Healthy Grains Bars, Maple Pumpkin Seeds with Sea Salt, Gluten Free." In my opinion these are delicious as well as pretty healthy for this type of item--a win-win! They are nice and pliable/chewy. I will be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: MKECheryl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in these!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many KIND bars and cannot recommend these bars. The flavor is good but they are not bars exactly but pieces of the product. They shipped fine but the minute I open a package they fall apart into pieces. I wanted them for a quick snack but have to use them in oatmeal, etc. I would not recommend them. There are other KINDS that are actually bars.
customer_reviews.author: marbar

customer_reviews.title: Something’s not right...
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy these by the box at regular stores, but decided to buy on amazon during lockdown. The quality of these bars is different than what I have always had in the past. The taste is slightly different (not bad, just different), and the bars crumble easily as you eat them (making a mess). That does not happen with the normal store bought bars. These were not past their expiration date, so I’m not sure what the problem is. They’re not terrible, but I don’t plan on buying these on amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast bars
customer_reviews.text: I found these bars when I went on delta airlines and they were giving these as a snack. These bars are so delicious. They are not overly sweet like other bars and filling. I eat this for breakfast to give me energy in the morning and it holds me through till lunch time.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: bars were fine, good date
customer_reviews.text: Bars as expected. Whoever shipped it managed to lose the package and it had to be resent. Then after the resend arrived, two days after, the original order showed up.
customer_reviews.author: A Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for DF or GF diets
customer_reviews.text: These are a great snack for anyone on a dairy free or gluten free diet! They have traces of chocolate to satisfy a sweet tooth, but do not contain milk. I’d highly recommend these as a snack for anyone who is trying to eat healthier.
customer_reviews.author: E. Abramson

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: What a flavorful, healthy, and light snack to have to stem the tide of approaching hunger. I would recommend. Be careful, because you can easily eat a bunch in one sitting.😁
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Got stale instead of freshness
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find these bars and get them. They are a great breakfast bar or afternoon snack. I opened a box to eat one and share them with a friend. We took a bite and all I can say is yuck!!!! They tasted stale and old like they were way, way past the expiration date. The expiration date is 12/2020. So we opened another box and tried again same problem. I bought these because of the price. Needless, to say I will not be purchasing these again. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture on box is deceptive
customer_reviews.text: Picture on box is deceptive! And because they are "wafer thin" they fall apart after the first bite! No peanut to taste and the black specks someone mentioned are the chocolate 'chunks'! Very disappointing! Not buying again!
customer_reviews.author: LST

customer_reviews.title: Kind Of Average
customer_reviews.text: A lot of air in the packaging, not a lot of value for the money compared to other brands. I found the taste to be average, the texture is a bit gritty and not really to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Will not get what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: Twice I got the incorrect item. Instead of this i got 3 boxes of minis with totally different flavors. Annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty
customer_reviews.text: The bars are delicious and my kids love them. My one big complaint is that the ones I order are always dried out, whereas if I get them at the grocery store, they are chewy and fresher.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: TOO HARD
customer_reviews.text: These bars are too hard and crunchy for me. They taste stale and have little tiny seeds that get stuck in my teeth. Gave the whole box to my grandson. He'll eat anything and liked these bars. Did not mean to order these twice, that was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: BlueWaterBlonde

customer_reviews.title: Best granola bars on the market
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The maple + somewhat salty quality of these make it the best thing that Kind has to offer, in my opinion. They stopped stocking them at my local grocery store, so I was very happy to find them in bulk on Amazon, and the price through Subscribe & Save is very good.
customer_reviews.author: CembalistaTop Contributor: Pianos

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: OMG. These curb my evening sweets craving just perfectly. I love the fact that they are gluten free, as I am sensitive to it. Also good amount of protein. Tastes amazing.
customer_reviews.author: AMR

customer_reviews.title: my newest obsession
customer_reviews.text: I have so many dietary issues which makes prepackaged snacks a challenge, but these are delicious and buying in this method is cheaper than the grocery store!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: great taste a bit dry
customer_reviews.text: the flavor is great I just was expecting it to be so dry. the ingredients are very good and healthy I just need to eat it with coffee
customer_reviews.author: Vickey White

customer_reviews.title: Use by date very soon, less than a month left...
customer_reviews.text: Order of 6 boxes arrived and the use by date is in less than a months time. Very disappointing, as I can’t eat them all by then.
customer_reviews.author: H.ROBS.79

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bars for my pre-workout or when I go camping, trekking. Even when I don't want to eat before I go to bed, I just have one bar and then I'll be fine a whole night.
customer_reviews.author: Saran Thitisakuntorn

customer_reviews.title: Kind bars taste good and are a source of protein.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for protein in between meals and for breakfast. The honey oat is really good. They were delivered in a timely fashion and much easier ordering it here than walmart or grocery store because they hardly ever have it.
customer_reviews.author: GBB

customer_reviews.title: Bird food? Lots of seeds, little flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Received these with a 2 month expiration window. Amazon was great and refunded the money, told me to keep them. I tried them...taste like nothing. I do not taste anything remotely close to chocolate. All the seeds are healthy though, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected - oops on me
customer_reviews.text: I think I did not read the advertisement fully as I do not receive what I thought I was purchasing. They were okay, but my bad, since I purchased the wrong item.
customer_reviews.author: Annette T. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: These are by far my favorite granola snack
customer_reviews.text: I thought 40 bars was going to be excessive, but with two of us, it really wasn't. I would and will buy these again because they are my favorite. The price isn't bad as long as you have somewhere to store all of the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Renee D.

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: They come in sperate boxes/ packaging just as bought in the store making it easy to do so many different things with. I leave a box at work and in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie M.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Expired!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a ton of these and the Double Dark Chocolate ones at the same time, and over half of them expire within the next 60 days, and the rest expire in 6 months. That's outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: JESSIE BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars, I often work 12 hour shifts and I don’t eat huge meals, I often will have a Kind bar when I’m on one or two of my breaks. I toss them in my pack and I’m all good to go, I like that they are filling and taste great, my teenager loves them as an after school snack for when she is on her way home.
customer_reviews.author: Viper

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very yummy, the same as what we get from the store just a better deal (30 for $12). They came in six boxes of five, One of my boxes of five came crushed but I believe that many have Happened in transit. There were fresh and yummy, the perfect breastfeeding snack!
customer_reviews.author: Mckayla Kazimierowski

customer_reviews.title: I'm in LOVE with these!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I have found a bar that has whole food ingredients and that I love and my kids absolutely LOVE. As a busy mom of 5 kids there is a lot of time spent in the car getting kids to games and practices. These are a bar I can grab that all my kids love and will eat. I also have 2 children with life threatening food allergies and these are safe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently went GF and these have been a life saver for breakfast!! All of mine were fresh, no problems there...great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan E.

customer_reviews.title: Hard and brittle!
customer_reviews.text: I eat one of these every morning and have bought them online for years. I ordered 8 boxes and every one is hard as a rock! Horrible. They are usually moist and soft and delicious, not this time!
customer_reviews.author: Susan E Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: These bars are really good. They have a hint of honey flavor and nice chewy/crunchy texture. Just enough dark chocolate to keep you wanting more.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Gates

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Fodmap friendly.
customer_reviews.text: They're really tasty and make a nice, healthy snack to keep in my purse. And I'm on the FODMAP diet, and they are okay for me to eat..
customer_reviews.author: Raku Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, filling, and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars when I am on a diet. Best tasting healthy bars I have tried but they are not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Goldsmith Family

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: These bars are the best to have around when you forget a snack or breakfast. They taste so yummy and don’t crumble so easily which is nice. They aren’t super hard but pretty right.
customer_reviews.author: JandT

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as expected. They arrived timely and the box that I’ve opened was fresh. Great mid day snack.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old’s favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My son’s favorite bars by far. It’s nice having something so quick to take to TBall and the park and not have to worry about them melting everywhere. Bonus they are good for you and don’t have all the extra crap other brands have.
customer_reviews.author: ajmarcott

customer_reviews.title: Taste so good and price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for the second time. It was delivered next day. 6 boxes for this price, cannot beat that. Love the taste as well
customer_reviews.author: Sonal Tandon

customer_reviews.title: Great gluten nut free bars
customer_reviews.text: Being gluten and nut sensitive these are my go to bars as so many protein/ snack bars have nuts. I like these much better than most. Especially the maple ones which so far I haven’t been able to get in bulk on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Engelbert

customer_reviews.title: Healthy never tasted so good!
customer_reviews.text: The Oats and Honey Bars are very yummy. They have a great flavor and you would have no idea that you are eating a health bar filled with whole grains. Will definitely be buying these again. Love the product and the value.
customer_reviews.author: Ctraum

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite type of kind bars! This was a great price and lasted me a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: I love these and can't find them anywhere anymore! I don't eat much packaged food, but these are a healthy quick treat.
customer_reviews.author: DBasinow

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go snack
customer_reviews.text: Tasty, I keep some in my bag when I'm on the run. I have a lot of allergies and this satisfies me until I get chance to have a meal...great on the go snack
customer_reviews.author: Shelli

customer_reviews.title: broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: its tastes good. except most of mine came cracked. I'm very upset
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Flavor was good. Not as good as store bought. Seemed drier than any I have bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I like pumpkin seeds and have been looking for more natural treats. These really worked! Very good flavor and lots of good ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

product_meta.title: KIND Healthy Grains Bars, Dark Chocolate Chunk, Gluten Free, 1.2 oz, 30 Count
product_meta.description: Baked with at least five super grains to create a unique chewy and crunchy texture. Each bar provides at least one full serving of whole grains.
feature_bullets: We know, we know - it sounds indulgent. But this bar has five super grains including oats, buckwheat, millet, amaranth, and quinoa PLUS it packs 18g of whole grains per serving AND it's tasty.
100% Whole Grains including 5 Super Grains: Oats, Millet, Buckwheat, Amaranth, Quinoa
Gluten free, No Genetically Modified Ingredients, 0g Trans Fat, Kosher

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars948 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
